Description: Boundaries of the map plots in degrees latitude (y) and longitude (x)
See https://scitools.org.uk/cartopy/docs/latest/reference/projections.html for list of available projections.
Other entries under 'projection' are passed as keyword arguments to the projection constructor, e.g. ``central_longitude: 10.``.
